Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Cruelly \Cru"el*ly\, adv. 1. In a cruel manner. [1913 Webster]
2. Extremely; very. [Colloq.] --Spectator. [1913 Webster]
cruelly adv 1: under cruel circumstances; "a cruelly bitter winter" 2: in a cruel manner; "he treated his students cruelly"
